price: 70. Toks yra Allaho Dosnumas ir Allahas yra Pakankamas kaip Visa Žinantis.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
